title: Agrou White Wolf

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - On Full Moons, you may choose to attack a member of the Were faction. You may multitask with this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain the abilities and attributes of a random Were role, and for all purposes except win condition, are a member of the Were faction. You do not, however, count as the required Were Killing role.
- In the Were factional chat, you appear as your role given from the above attribute. Your kills from your White Wolf ability appear as a predetermined Neutral Killing role that would reasonably be killing. On death, you appear as a White Wolf.
- You may spawn in either REF or Neutral slots.
**Hunting Moon Enhancement** - Your attack becomes Rampage. You gain Invincible defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
